sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-forms',
  templateUrl: './forms.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./forms.component.css']
})
export class FormsComponent implements OnInit{
  public listComidas: Array<{comida: string}> = [
    {comida: "salada de frutas"},
    {comida: "ovos mexidos"},
    {comida: "x-bacon"}
  ]
  constructor() {}
  ngOnInit(): void {

  }

}
<form #form="ngForm">
    <label>
        name:
        <input type="text" name="nome" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        masculino:
        <input type="radio" name="nome" value="marculino" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        feminino:
        <input type="radio" name="sexo" value="feminino" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        outros:
        <input type="radio" name="sexo" value="outros" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        anos:
        <input type="range" name="anos" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        angular:
        <input type="checkbox" name="angular" value="angular" ngModel>
    </label>
    <label>
        react:
        <input type="checkbox" name="react" value="react" ngModel>
    </label>
    <select name="comidas" ngModel>
        <option value="">selecione uma comida</option>
        <option *ngFor="let item of listComidas" [ngValue]="item.comida">
            {{item.comida}}
        </option>
    </select>
</form>
{{ form.value | json }}
